transits.description: Current planetary positions in relation to natal chart

interpretation.approach: Compare current planetary positions to natal chart positions
interpretation.significance: Shows current influences and potential events

progressions.description: Symbolic advancement of the natal chart

secondary.description: One day = one year of life
secondary.calculation: Advance chart by one day for each year of life

solar_arc.calculation: Advance all planets by Sun's daily motion

solar_returns.description: Chart cast for moment Sun returns to natal position

lunar_returns.description: Chart cast for moment Moon returns to natal position

traditional.description: Classical approach using dignity and essential nature

psychological.description: Modern approach focusing on psychological patterns

grand_trine.description: Three planets forming trines to each other
grand_trine.interpretation: Natural talent and ease in related areas

t_square.description: Two planets in opposition, both square to a third planet
t_square.interpretation: Challenge leading to growth and resolution

grand_cross.description: Four planets forming two oppositions and four squares

yod.description: Two planets sextile each other, both quincunx to a third planet
yod.interpretation: Fate or destiny point requiring adjustment
